document_data.caption: Queen Amlaruil's Chariot.
document_data.name: ''Queen Amlaruil's Chariot''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Queen Amlaruil's Chariot''''' was a wondrous unique [[magic item]] from the island of [[Evermeet]].
document_data.Description: The ''[[chariot]]'' was usually pulled by a pair of [[unicorn]]s or [[pegasi]].
document_data.Powers: The ''chariot'' protected any riders by making it much more difficult for incoming attacks to strike them. Additionally, the magic of the ''chariot'' increased the likeliness of a rider's ranged attacks striking true and causing more physical harm. The ''chariot'' and any riders could ''[[teleport without error]]'' once per day.
document_data.History: Queen [[Amlaruil Moonflower]] used this chariot for her personal transportation.
